@NikkiAlderson2 I found radiotherapy quite tough. More clinical and cold than chemo. I didnâ€™t like being left on my own in there. But as time went on it got easier. People say moisturise lots but I found that made it worse ğŸ¤·ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ Take care x
